creator: meer.abidi@gmail.com
text:
In cluster environment duplicate sessions are getting created 
With different path
1:/
2:/foo
Issue is first session is getting update 
While /foo  is being idle hence session expired is not getting clear

Please provide more information.
This description is not enough to investigate the problem.
What is your setup?
In what conditions the problem occurs ?
creator: mgrigorov@apache.org

meer.abidi@gmail.com
text: Problem is occurring when session is getting expired after some specific time we clear the cookie but still it shows session expired because it contains two session same code was working with tomcat 8.0 now we migrated to 8.5.x.
